item.title: About Me
item.description:
ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I’m Hunter Ji, an experienced Full Stack Engineer, Independent Developer, and aspiring Designer. I’m passionate about creating user-friendly and innovative applications that merge technical excellence with thoughtful design principles. Currently, I’m exploring UI/UX design while continuing to develop solutions that effectively assist others.

I regularly share my design work and technical insights, as I believe in the power of knowledge sharing and continuous learning. I have a deep love for the intersection of technology and design, and I’m always open to connecting with like-minded individuals who share similar interests.
